verses.verse: James, <S%G2385><s%> a servant <S%G1401><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> to the twelve <S%G1427><s%> tribes <S%G5443><s%> which are in the Dispersion: <S%G1290><s%> Greetings. <S%G5463><s%>
Count it <S%G2233><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> joy, <S%G5479><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> you fall <S%G4045><s%> into various <S%G4164><s%> temptations, <S%G3986><s%>
knowing <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the testing <S%G1383><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> produces <S%G2716><s%> endurance. <S%G5281><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Let endurance <S%G5281><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> its perfect <S%G5046><s%> work, <S%G2041><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you may be <S%G5600><s%> perfect <S%G5046><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> complete, <S%G3648><s%> lacking <S%G3007><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> nothing. <S%G3367><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> lacks <S%G3007><s%> wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> let him ask <S%G154><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who gives <S%G1325><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> liberally <S%G574><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> without <S%G3361><s%> reproach; <S%G3679><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it will be given <S%G1325><s%> to him. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> let him ask <S%G154><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> without <S%G3367><s%> any doubting, <S%G1252><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he who doubts <S%G1252><s%> is like <S%G1503><s%> a wave <S%G2830><s%> of the sea, <S%G2281><s%> driven by the wind <S%G416><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tossed. <S%G4494><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> let that <S%G1565><s%> man <S%G444><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> think <S%G3633><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he will receive <S%G2983><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
He is a double-minded <S%G1374><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> unstable <S%G182><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ways. <S%G3598><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> let the brother <S%G80><s%> in humble circumstances <S%G5011><s%> glory <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> high position; <S%G5311><s%>

and <S%G1161><s%> the rich, <S%G4145><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> is made humble, <S%G5014><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> the flower <S%G438><s%> in the grass, <S%G5528><s%> he will pass away. <S%G3928><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> arises <S%G393><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> the scorching <S%G2742><s%> wind, <S%G2532><s%> and withers <S%G3583><s%> the grass, <S%G5528><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the flower <S%G438><s%> in it <S%G846><s%> falls, <S%G1601><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the beauty <S%G2143><s%> of its <S%G846><s%> appearance <S%G4383><s%> perishes. <S%G622><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> will <S%G3133><s%> the rich man <S%G4145><s%> fade away <S%G3133><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> pursuits. <S%G4197><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is the man <S%G435><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> endures <S%G5278><s%> temptation, <S%G3986><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> when he has been <S%G1096><s%> approved, <S%G1384><s%> he will receive <S%G2983><s%> the crown <S%G4735><s%> of life, <S%G2222><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> promised <S%G1861><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who love <S%G25><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Let no man <S%G3367><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> when <S%G3754><s%> he is tempted, <S%G3985><s%> "I am tempted <S%G3985><s%> by <S%G575><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>" for <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> can't <S%G551><s%> be tempted <S%G2076><s%> by evil, <S%G2556><s%> and he <S%G846><s%> himself tempts <S%G3985><s%> no <S%G1161><s%> one. <S%G3762><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> each one <S%G1538><s%> is tempted, <S%G3985><s%> when he is drawn away <S%G1828><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> lust, <S%G1939><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> enticed. <S%G1185><s%>

Then the lust, <S%G1939><s%> when <S%G1534><s%> it has conceived, <S%G4815><s%> bears <S%G5088><s%> sin; <S%G266><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> the sin, <S%G266><s%> when it is full grown, <S%G658><s%> brings forth <S%G616><s%> death. <S%G2288><s%>
Don't <S%G3361><s%> be <S%G4105><s%> deceived, <S%G4105><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> brothers. <S%G80><s%>

Every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> gift <S%G1394><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> perfect <S%G5046><s%> gift <S%G1434><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> from above, <S%G509><s%> coming down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> of lights, <S%G5457><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> can be <S%G1762><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> variation, <S%G3883><s%> nor <S%G3756><s%> turning <S%G5157><s%> shadow. <S%G644><s%>

Of his own will <S%G1014><s%> he brought <S%G616><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> forth by the word <S%G3056><s%> of truth, <S%G1519><s%> that we <S%G2248><s%> should be <S%G1511><s%> a kind <S%G5100><s%> of first fruits <S%G536><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> creatures. <S%G2938><s%>

So, <S%G5620><s%> then, my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> let every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> be <S%G2077><s%> swift <S%G5036><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> hear, <S%G191><s%> slow <S%G1021><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> speak, <S%G2980><s%> and slow <S%G1021><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> anger; <S%G3709><s%>
for <S%G1063><s%> the anger <S%G3709><s%> of man <S%G435><s%> doesn't <S%G3756><s%> produce <S%G2716><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Therefore, <S%G1352><s%> putting away <S%G659><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> filthiness <S%G4507><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> overflowing <S%G4050><s%> of wickedness, <S%G2549><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> humility <S%G4240><s%> the implanted <S%G1721><s%> word, <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> souls. <S%G5590><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> doers <S%G4163><s%> of the word, <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> hearers, <S%G202><s%> deluding <S%G3884><s%> your own selves. <S%G1438><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> is a hearer <S%G202><s%> of the word <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a doer, <S%G4163><s%> he <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> like <S%G1503><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> looking <S%G2657><s%> at his <S%G846><s%> natural <S%G1078><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a mirror; <S%G2072><s%>

for <S%G1063><s%> he sees <S%G2657><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> goes away, <S%G565><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> forgets <S%G1950><s%> what kind of man <S%G3697><s%> he was. <S%G2258><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he who looks <S%G3879><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the perfect <S%G5046><s%> law <S%G3551><s%> of freedom, <S%G1657><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> continues, <S%G3887><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> being <S%G1096><s%> a hearer <S%G202><s%> who <S%G3778><s%> forgets, <S%G1953><s%> but <S%G235><s%> a doer <S%G4163><s%> of the work, <S%G2041><s%> this man <S%G3778><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> blessed <S%G3107><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> what he <S%G846><s%> does. <S%G4162><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> thinks <S%G1380><s%> himself to be <S%G1511><s%> religious <S%G2357><s%> while he doesn't <S%G3361><s%> bridle <S%G5468><s%> his <S%G846><s%> tongue, <S%G1100><s%> but <S%G235><s%> deceives <S%G538><s%> his <S%G846><s%> heart, <S%G2588><s%> this man <S%G5127><s%>'s religion <S%G2356><s%> is worthless. <S%G3152><s%>

Pure <S%G2513><s%> religion <S%G2356><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> undefiled <S%G283><s%> before <S%G3844><s%> our God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> this: <S%G3778><s%> to visit <S%G1980><s%> the fatherless <S%G3737><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> widows <S%G5503><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> affliction, <S%G2347><s%> and to keep <S%G5083><s%> oneself <S%G1438><s%> unstained <S%G784><s%> by <S%G575><s%> the world. <S%G2889><s%>
